HeroSection.Hero_SubTitle2: Make your trade easier with HVAMBIT.

ServicesSection.Services_Title: Let HVAM make your trade easier than before.
ServicesSection.Services_SubTitle: Buy, sell, swap and access unique services - all from a single platform.
ServicesSection.Card_One_SubTitle: Create an escrow account by providing your transaction details and send an escrow payment request to seller.
ServicesSection.Card_Two_SubTitle: Buyer transfers payment to HVAM escrow account for safekeeping until the conditions are met and service is delivered.
ServicesSection.Card_Three_SubTitle: Seller to provide proof of deliveries and HVAM to verifies each parties’ documents.
ServicesSection.Card_Four_SubTitle: The buyer now has a specific inspection period to verify the product before the acceptance or rejection.
ServicesSection.Card_Five_SubTitle: If the product meets the specifications and conditions agreed upon, HVAM may now release the funds to the seller accordingly.

AboutSection.About_SubTitle1: HVAMBIT offers its participants with multiple benefits and advantages such as own crypto wallet to explore blockchain, trading, swapping, NFT platform, and crypto payment escrow services – all from a single platform. One of our purposes is to replace the classic financial instruments (LC.DLC.SBLC), to financial instrument based on cryptocurrency to make trading move easier and safer between companies and individuals.

FeaturesSection.Featu_SubTitle: Our project grasps one of the problems in overall marketplace; “trust”. Developing decentralized applications and escrow services can guarantee the security of users’ assets and satisfaction. Our upmost scheme is to provide safe trading industry between parties.
FeaturesSection.fCard_One_SubTitle: Safe trading platform is the upmost goal of HVAMBIT. Personal and financial information will be secured.
FeaturesSection.fCard_Two_SubTitle: Easily and securely make payment for the goods/service you desire.
FeaturesSection.fCard_Three_SubTitle: Store all your digital assets securely.
FeaturesSection.fCard_Five_SubTitle: Set-up how you want to purchase the cryptocurrency you like.
FeaturesSection.fCard_Six_SubTitle: Exchange any cryptocurrency faster, simpler, and in secure way.
